My Creative Process

All of my Web Development projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Before i jump into any project i like to have a pre-discussion regarding client requirement such as client goals for this project, target audience & what are the features client want on site.

2

Brainstromming^concepts

List out your core web content - This content contain that is absolutely necessary to communicate your business offering and message to your online community.

3

UI/UX PLANNING

UI & UX is the most essential part of the website. I like to keep interface simple and avoid unnecessary elements and clear in the language in order for users feel more comfortable and are able to get things done more quickly.

4

INTERACTION

I create complete interactive website because of Having an interactive website means to have your website designed in a way which is appealing and interesting to your audience, with features that are going to increase user experience.
